--- format: revealjs: incremental: false theme: [default, custom.scss] execute: echo: true --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## `babelquarto`によるQuartoウェブサイトの多言語化 {.theme-slide1 .line} [Making a multilingual Quarto website with `babelquarto`]{.medium}
ニッタ ジョエル [Joel NITTA]{.medsmall}
::: {.medium} `Japan.R2024` ![](images/qrcode.svg){.absolute bottom=200 right=280 width="200" height="200"} ::: ::: {.aside} ::: {.small} Image: [Alexandre Debiève on Unsplash](https://unsplash.com/ja/%E5%86%99%E7%9C%9F/%E3%83%A9%E3%82%B8%E3%82%AA%E3%83%97%E3%83%AC%E3%83%BC%E3%83%A4%E3%83%BC%E3%83%AD%E3%83%83%E3%83%88-UmX-OgGODfM) ::: ::: ## 自己紹介：`@joelnitta` {.line} :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="50%"} - 千葉大学 准教授 - シダ植物の進化と生態学 - Rパッケージ開発
（進化生態学向け） ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} ![](https://github.com/joelnitta/joelnitta-site/blob/master/static/media/headers/research_img2.jpg?raw=true){fig-alt="Image of Joel Nitta in field" height="450"} ::: ::: ::: {.aside} I am an assoc. prof. at Chiba University in Japan studying fern ecology and evolution. I develop R packages for eco-evo. ::: ## Quarto はすごいぞ {.line} :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="40%"} - QuartoはRやPythonの計算結果を直接文章に入れるツール。 - HTML（ウェブサイト、スライド、本） - PDF - MS Word ::: ::: {.column width="60%"} ![](https://rstudio.github.io/cheatsheets/html/images/quarto-illustration.png) [Artwork from "Hello, Quarto" keynote by Julia Lowndes and Mine Çetinkaya-Rundel, presented at RStudio Conference 2022. Illustrated by [Allison Horst](https://allisonhorst.com/cetinkaya-rundel-lowndes-quarto-keynote).]{.small} ::: :::: ::: {.aside} [Quarto is a fantastic tool for data science. It supports multiple programming languages and output formats.]{.medium} ::: ## Quartoの多言語機能は未完成 {.line} :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="50%"} - しかし、Quartoは比較的新しいため、まだ欠けて
いる機能があります。 - 標準では**多言語機能**が
ありません。 ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} ![](images/multi_lang_issue.png){width=90%} ::: []{.medsmall} :::: ::: {.aside} But Quarto does not yet support multilingual websites. ::: ## `babelquarto` {.line} :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="50%"} - [@maelle](https://github.com/maelle)と[@Nenuial](https://github.com/Nenuial)によるQuarto BookやWebsiteの**各言語**のバージョンを**レンダーする** Rパッケージ。 - （翻訳とは別） ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} ![](images/babelquarto_pagedown.png) []{.medsmall} ::: :::: ::: {.aside} `babelquarto`by [@maelle](https://github.com/maelle) and [@Nenuial](https://github.com/Nenuial) renders a multilingual Quarto Book or Website (separate from actual translation) ::: ## 例：ソフトウェア・カーペントリー日本 {.medsmall} [Example: ]{.large} ## 注意 {.line} - 将来的にQuartoに多言語機能が加わる可能性が
あります。 - その場合、`babelquarto`は不要になるでしょう。 - しかし、現時点で多言語のニーズがある場合は十分活用できます。 ::: {.aside} Caution: there is a possibility that support for multilingual websites will be added to Quarto, so someday you won't need to use `babelquarto`. But it is a good option for now. ::: # babelquarto demo {.line} ## 基本的なサイトを作る ::: {.cell} ::: :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="50%" .medsmall} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(quarto) quarto_create_project( name = "example", type = "website", no_prompt = TRUE, quiet = TRUE ) ``` ::: ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` example ├── _quarto.yml ├── about.qmd ├── index.qmd └── styles.css ``` ::: ::: ::: :::: ::: {.aside} First step: create a Quarto website ::: ## 基本的なサイトを作る :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="50%" .medsmall} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(quarto) quarto_create_project( name = "example", type = "website", no_prompt = TRUE, quiet = TRUE ) ``` ::: ::: ::: {.column width="50%" .medsmall} ::: {.cell filename='example/_quarto.yml'} ```{.r .cell-code} project: type: website website: title: "example" navbar: left: - href: index.qmd text: Home - about.qmd format: html: theme: cosmo css: styles.css toc: true ``` ::: ::: :::: ::: {.aside} First step: create a Quarto website ::: ## 主言語を登録する :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="50%" .medsmall} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(babelquarto) register_main_language( main_language = "ja", project_path = "example" ) ``` ::: ::: ::: {.column width="50%" .medsmall} ::: {.cell filename='example/_quarto.yml'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="|21-26"} project: type: website website: title: "example" navbar: left: - href: index.qmd text: Home - about.qmd format: html: theme: cosmo css: styles.css toc: true babelquarto: languagecodes: - name: ja text: "Version in ja" mainlanguage: 'ja' lang: ja ``` ::: ::: :::: ::: {.aside} Next step: add main (default) language ::: ## 翻訳言語を追加する :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="50%" .medsmall} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(babelquarto) register_further_languages( further_languages = c("en"), project_path = "example" ) ``` ::: ::: ::: {.column width="50%" .medsmall} ::: {.cell filename='example/_quarto.yml'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="|21-32"} project: type: website website: title: "example" navbar: left: - href: index.qmd text: Home - about.qmd format: html: theme: cosmo css: styles.css toc: true babelquarto: languagecodes: - name: en text: "Version in en" - name: ja text: "Version in ja" mainlanguage: 'ja' languages: ['en'] title-en: title in en description-en: description in en author-en: author in en lang: ja ``` ::: ::: :::: ::: {.aside} Next step: add further language(s) ::: ## `_quarto.yml`を編集する :::: {.columns .medsmall} ::: {.column width="48%"} ::: {.cell filename='example/_quarto.yml'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="|5,24,26,29-30"} project: type: website website: title: "example" navbar: left: - href: index.qmd text: Home - about.qmd format: html: theme: cosmo css: styles.css toc: true babelquarto: languagecodes: - name: en text: "Version in en" - name: ja text: "Version in ja" mainlanguage: 'ja' languages: ['en'] title-en: title in en description-en: description in en author-en: author in en lang: ja ``` ::: ::: ::: {.column width="4%" .center .large} **→** ::: ::: {.column width="48%"} ::: {.cell filename='example/_quarto.yml'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="|8-9,5,23,25,28-29"} project: type: website website: title: "テスト用のサイト" navbar: left: - index.qmd - about.qmd format: html: theme: cosmo css: styles.css toc: true babelquarto: languagecodes: - name: en text: "English" - name: ja text: "日本語" mainlanguage: 'ja' languages: ['en'] title-en: Test Site description-en: My test website author-en: Joel Nitta lang: ja ``` ::: ::: :::: ::: {.aside} Next step: edit `_quarto.yml` ::: ## 翻訳ファイルを追加する :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="30%"} ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` example ├── _quarto.yml ├── about.qmd ├── index.qmd └── styles.css ``` ::: ::: ::: ::: {.column width="20%" .center .large} **→** ::: ::: {.column width="46%"} ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` example ├── _quarto.yml ├── about.en.qmd ├── about.qmd ├── index.en.qmd ├── index.qmd └── styles.css ``` ::: ::: ::: :::: ::: {.aside} Next step: add translated files, e.g. `index.en.qmd` (English version of `index.qmd`) ::: --- :::: {.columns .medsmall} ::: {.column width="50%"} ::: {.cell filename='example/index.qmd'} ```{.r .cell-code} --- title: "ホーム" --- これは Quarto のウェブサイトです。 Quarto のウェブサイトについて詳しく知りたい場合は、 をご覧ください。 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} ::: {.cell filename='example/index.en.qmd'} ```{.r .cell-code} --- title: "Home" --- This is a Quarto website. To learn more about Quarto websites visit . ``` ::: ::: :::: ## レンダーする 注意：`quarto render`が使えません ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} render_website(project_path = "example") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1m[34m [1/2] index.qmd[39m[22m [1m[34m [2/2] about.qmd[39m[22m Output created: _site/index.html [1m[34m [1/2] index.qmd[39m[22m [1m[34m [2/2] about.qmd[39m[22m Output created: _site/index.html ``` ::: ::: ::: {.aside} Render website. Note you cannot use `quarto render`, use `babelquarto::render_website()` instead. To serve, use `servr::httw()`. ::: ## サーブする 注意：`quarto preview`が使えません ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} servr::httw("example/_site") ``` ::: []{.medsmall} ## 内容の自動翻訳 {.line} - Markdownやコードごと翻訳されると困ります。 . . . - 「ChatGPT、これを翻訳してね」 [`::: {.columns}`]{.medlarge} . . . [`::: {.列}`]{.medlarge} . . . - いや、だからそうではなく・・ ::: {.aside} If you try to use AI for automated translation, it might translate the actual Markdown code. ::: ## 内容の自動翻訳 {.line} :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="50%"} - **解決策 ①**：Custom GPT。プロンプトでMarkdownをいじらないように頼む。 ::: ::: {.column width="10%"} ::: ::: {.column width="40%"} ![](images/custom_gpt.png){width=200} [[Japanese Code Proofreader](https://chatgpt.com/g/g-673042d78e908190b7535ee1e91683be-japanese-code-proofreader)]{.medium} ::: :::: ::: {.aside} Solution 1: use a Custom GPT with a prompt to preserve Markdown formatting. ::: ## 内容の自動翻訳 {.line} :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="50%"} - **解決策 ②**：`babeldown`。DeepLに送る前にMarkdownをXMLにパースすることで内容だけを翻訳する。 ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} ![](images/babeldown_pagedown.png) []{.medsmall} ::: :::: ::: {.aside} Solution 2: use `babeldown`, which parses the Markdown into XML and only translates the content using DeepL. ::: ## 翻訳の維持 {.line .smaller} :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="50%"} - 元の文章が変わると翻訳を更新する
必要があります。 - `PO`ファイルの使用によって、各文章とその翻訳を管理できます。 - CrowdinやTransifexなどのクラウドツールは、`PO`ファイルを裏で使っています。 ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} ![](https://localazy.com/directus9/assets/82fc8da9-d665-4604-940a-a3d0737e4857/?quality=80&format=webp) ::: []{.small} :::: ::: {.aside} You need to update the translation if the source changes. PO files are good for this, and are used by cloud services like Crowdin and Transifex. ::: ## 翻訳の維持 {.line} :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="50%"} - ザ・カーペントリーズでは[Crowdin](https://carpentries.crowdin.com/)を使っています ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} ![](images/r-lesson-trans.svg) []{.medsmall} ::: :::: ::: {.aside} At Software Carpentry Japan, we use Crowdin for community-based translations. ::: ## まとめ {.line} :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="70%"} 多言語化は**アクセス**を増やすためだけでなく、**コミュニティを育む**ためにも重要です！ [Enjoy!]{.medlarge} ::: ::: {.column width="30%"} ![](https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEhjc1QFOdIIO1Sp_7D4tRBG7frYYTvm_wAv9Swi1qvosxV3b34vBm7f2I5n9SEw-yjQm9LWxo-8h7lnSD7JApMNCQaCv1qtT_WysBClnhOFFPUzdNRkgvH6qaJpGNoW5kg36Wq3DSLhyphenhyphenoI/s800/tree_seichou02.png){fig-align="center"} ::: :::: ::: {.aside} Take-home message: internationalization is important not only for accessibility but for growing communities! :::

<script>
  // htmlwidgets need to know to resize themselves when slides are shown/hidden.
  // Fire the "slideenter" event (handled by htmlwidgets.js) when the current
  // slide changes (different for each slide format).
  (function () {
    // dispatch for htmlwidgets
    function fireSlideEnter() {
      const event = window.document.createEvent("Event");
      event.initEvent("slideenter", true, true);
      window.document.dispatchEvent(event);
    }

    function fireSlideChanged(previousSlide, currentSlide) {
      fireSlideEnter();

      // dispatch for shiny
      if (window.jQuery) {
        if (previousSlide) {
          window.jQuery(previousSlide).trigger("hidden");
        }
        if (currentSlide) {
          window.jQuery(currentSlide).trigger("shown");
        }
      }
    }

    // hookup for slidy
    if (window.w3c_slidy) {
      window.w3c_slidy.add_observer(function (slide_num) {
        // slide_num starts at position 1
        fireSlideChanged(null, w3c_slidy.slides[slide_num - 1]);
      });
    }

  })();
</script>
